Title: Anti-schistosomiasis activity
Description: Prediction of the activity of small molecules against the schistosoma parasite. This model has been developed by Ersilia thanks to the data provided by the Swiss TPH. In vitro activity against newly transformed schistosoma (nts) and adult worms was measured (% of inhibition of activity and IC50, respectively)
Interpretation: The probabilities of the molecule being active against S.mansoni in NTS stage (single point inhibition 70% and 90% at  10uM) and adult stage (IC50 assay at cut-offs 5 and 10uM)
